channel.title: [PI] is there a scanner.java?
channel.description:
When I run my server I get an error involving scanner.java when i try adding drops to npcs. can anyone please tell me if there is even a file called scanner.java and if so where? Help is much appreciated.
EDIT: Here is the error I receive when I start my server. [code]java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516) at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:70) [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3... 3... 1... Starting...Now! [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
